name: KITCHEN ON FIRE!! with Rhino.
description:
Chef Rhino got a new job!! The problem is that he got fired from lots of cooking jobs before, because of his poor expertise. Help Rhino with his new adventure and don't let him fire up the kitchen again!!!!

Controls:
C: chop, Space: take object, Press F continuously while holding extinguisher to get rid of fire.

Click over the screen to start moving.
